modules.description: Provides functions to parse XML elements, extract attributes, and retrieve text content from nested nodes. Works with strings and custom data types representing XML nodes and attributes. Enables straightforward processing of structured data in XML format, such as configuration files or simple data exchanges.

Parses XML content from an input channel into a structured representation, extracting elements and their attributes. Works with attribute pairs and a tree-like data structure representing XML nodes. Used to process configuration files and data interchange formats by traversing and querying parsed elements.
